edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse

Class Enemy

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.GameObject
      • edu.csupomona.cs.cs141.thehouse.Enemy
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable, java.lang.Comparable<GameObject>

    public class Enemy
extends GameObject
    This class has parameters that will define the position of the enemy pirate as well as whether they are alive. Furthermore, the methods that will be contained in this class will allow for the pirate to move, and to check for, kill, or be killed by the Player.
    Author:
    Dylan Nguyen, Andrew Nipp, Andrew Niklas, Ben Nickerson
    See Also:
    Serialized Form

      This field is part of a pair of integers that contain the next position of the Player

    • Constructor Detail

      • Enemy

        public Enemy()
        This constructor will call GameObject.setObjectName(String) with ENEMY_NAME as the parameter. It will then call GameObject.setHiddenName(String) with the String value returned from GameObject.getBlankName() as the parameter. Finally it calls GameObject.setObjId(int) with the objID as the parameter.

      • Enemy

        public Enemy(boolean showEnemy)
        This method determines whether or not to show the Enemy on the Grid based on a boolean value passed in as a parameter.
        Parameters:
        showEnemy - - boolean that will show the Enemy if true, otherwise it will hide the Enemy.

    • Method Detail

      • moveEnemy

        public void moveEnemy(Grid grid)
        This method will move the enemy in a random direction based on the int returned when Dice.roll(int) is called. If the int is 0, 1, 2, or 3 the Enemy will move up, down, right, or left. It does this by calling GameObject.setXY(int, int) after checking that the move will not force them off the Grid or into another Enemy and finally it calls cleanEnemies(Grid). It will reroll if the integer
        Parameters:
        grid - - Grid

      • cleanEnemies

        private void cleanEnemies(Grid grid)
        This method removes the symbol of the Enemy after they move to a new position by calling Grid.changeObjectIntoBlank(int, int).
        Parameters:
        grid - - Grid

      • getYPosition

        public int getYPosition()
        This method will pass yPosition to whatever calls it
        Returns:
        - int yPosition

      • setYPosition

        public int setYPosition(int y)
        This method will change yPosition to whatever int is passed in as a parameter. It then returns the new value of yPosition
        Parameters:
        y - - int containing the value of whatever yPosition is intended to be
        Returns:
        - int yPosition

      • printEnemyPos

        public void printEnemyPos(int i)

        Parameters:
